Hi Heath and Dim, Please view the requested changes below: Pricing Link changes: All prices still Ex. GST Small truck:
  • Rate: $72 per half hour
  • Call out fee $72
  • Weekend & Public Holiday Surcharge
Additional $5 per half hour Big truck:
  • Rate: $78 per half hour
  • Call out fee $78
  • Weekend & Public Holiday Surcharge
Additional $7.50 per half hour
  • deposit changed to $350
I have also attached a photo of what i need removed from the 11t truck pricing link. Also lets discuss early next week the plan for the new Ezy Move website. Thanks Regards, Adrian Get Outlook for iOS

Hi Adrian,

We have adjusted the call out fee calculation. Can you try again and let me know if this works fro you?

The call out fee is the calculation from base to pickup. This is the calculation as sent above previously.

If travel from Dropoff to Base is 0-45 mins call out fee is 30 mins
If travel from Dropoff to Base is 45-60mins call out fee is 45 mins
If travel from Dropoff to Base is 60-90 mins call out fee is 1hr.
If travel is 90mins + Call out fee will be advised by admin staff to customer

Get Outlook for iOS

Hi Adrian,

We just want to confirm, what would be the calculation for the calloutfee?
